meanings.sent1: She showed great vigors when lifting the heavy boxes.
meanings.sent2: The athlete's vigors helped him win the race.
meanings.sent3: With impressive vigors, the little dog chased after the ball.
meanings.sent4: The vigors of the storm shook the entire house.
meanings.sent5: The old tree stood tall, its vigors evident in every branch.

meanings.sent1: The vigors of the waterfall were mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent2: The vigors of the argument could be felt throughout the room.
meanings.sent3: The vigors of the toddler's tantrum surprised everyone in the store.
meanings.sent4: The vigors of the music filled the concert hall with emotion.
meanings.sent5: The vigors of the volcano eruption were terrifying to witness.

meanings.sent1: Her vigors for dancing were contagious, and soon everyone joined in.
meanings.sent2: The vigors of the crowd at the game made it an exciting event.
meanings.sent3: With great vigors, the children played in the park until sunset.
meanings.sent4: The vigors of the party lasted long into the night.
meanings.sent5: His vigors for learning new things made him a great student.
